<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Service Technician]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
  21st Century Equipment LLC  in Torrington, WY is now accepting applications for experienced Service Technicians.  Minimum 1-5 years’ experience in agriculture diesel technology.  Basic knowledge of precision farming a plus.  Required skills include excellent computer skills, familiarity with agricultural equipment, strong mechanical aptitude and good interpersonal skills.  Must be able to lift 75 lbs, extended periods of walking, standing and bending will be required. Benefits include Health & Dental/Vision Insurance, Life Insurance, Traditional & Roth 401k with Company Match, Profit Sharing, Paid Vacation & Holidays, and more.  Salary range is based on experience from $20.00-$35.00/hour.  Hourly Rate plus Monthly Incentive based on labor efficiency, OR Progressive Scale Incentive Plan, DOE. No premium for overtime. This position is also eligible for an On-Call Bonus. EOE.  
  

  
  21st Century Equipment, LLC  
  

  
 JOB DESCRIPTION 
  

  
 JOB TITLE:   Service Technician                                                   
  

  
  REPORTS TO:    Service Manager/Store Manager   
  

  
  WORKS CLOSELY WITH:  Service Manager  
  

  
  JOB SUMMARY:    Perform diagnostics, repairs and maintenance work on customer and/or dealer owned agriculture equipment.  The primary product of the Service Dept. is billable time, so individual must possess good interpersonal skills, be able to interact with customers and be capable of providing detailed repair information. 
  

  
  ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS:  
  

  

  
+  Repair and/or recondition agriculture equipment. 
  

  
+  Operate special tools and equipment in a safe and orderly manner. 
  

  
+  Participate in Service Educate Training programs required for the development of skills and knowledge. 
  

  
+  Follows all safety rules and regulations in performing work assignments. 
  

  
+  Maintains a clean and safe work area and performs work in the same fashion. 
  

  

  
  EDUCATIONAL AND EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS:   
  

  

  
+  1+ years of experience in performing service repairs. 
  

  
+  Ability to operate vehicles and equipment used for diagnostic purposes. 
  

  
+  Valid driver’s license is required. 
  

  

  
  SPECIAL SKILL REQUIREMENTS:  
  

  

  
+  Proficient knowledge of mechanical, electrical and hydraulic systems used in the repair of agriculture equipment. 
  

  

  
  PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS:  
  

  

  
+  Extended periods of standing, climbing bending, must be able to lift 75 lbs regularly, extensive hours on a computer. May be exposed to extreme weather conditions from extreme heat to winter blizzard conditions. 
  

  

  
 ***THIS COMPANY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO MODIFY, INTERPRET, OR APPLY THIS JOB DESCRIPTION IN ANY WAY THE COMPANY DESIRES. THIS JOB DESCRIPTION IN NO WAY IMPLIES THAT THESE ARE THE ONLY DUTIES, INCLUDING ESSENTIAL DUTIES, TO BE PERFORMED BY THE EMPLOYEE OCCUPYING THIS POSITION. THIS JOB DESCRIPTION IS NOT AN EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT IMPLIED OR OTHERWISE. THE EMPLOYMENT RELATIONSHIP REMAINS “AT WILL.” THE AFOREMENTIONED JOB REQUIREMENTS ARE SUBJECT TO REASONABLY ACCOMMODATE QUALIFIED DISABLED INDIVIDUALS.***

    </job>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Utility/Detail Specialist]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
 21st Century Equipment has an opening for a Utility/Detail Specialist at our Imperial, NE location.  Position is responsible for cleaning and light maintenance of the facility, equipment, and vehicles. Prefer some working knowledge of Ag equipment, detailing and janitorial skills. Benefits include Health & Dental/Vision Insurance, Life Insurance, Traditional & Roth 401K retirement plan with company match, Profit Sharing, Paid Vacation & Holidays, and more. Must be able to lift up to 75 lbs and work in extreme weather conditions, with extended periods of walking, standing, and bending. Benefits include Health & Dental/Vision Insurance, Life Insurance, Traditional & Roth 401k with Company Match, Profit Sharing, Paid Vacation & Holidays, and more.  Salary varies based on experience from $12.35-$15.00/hour, overtime eligible.  EOE. 
  

  
 
  

  
 JOB TITLE:   Utility/Washbay 
  

  
  REPORTS TO:    Service Manager or Location Manager 
  

  
  JOB SUMMARY:    Performs maintenance duties and cleaning of equipment for the service department. 
  

  
  ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS (listed in order of importance):    
  

  

  
+  Wash and detail internal and customer equipment. 
  

  
+  Maintenance and repair of the wash bay. 
  

  
+  Perform grounds maintenance for the dealer properties 
  

  
+  Assist in moving displays or equipment within the dealership. 
  

  
+  Operate a forklift to transport parts, equipment and supplies for the dealership 
  

  
+  Basic shop and tool room cleaning and organization. 
  

  
+  Other duties as assigned 
  

  

  
  EDUCATIONAL AND EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS:   None 
  

  
  SPECIAL SKILL REQUIREMENTS:  
  

  

  
+  Ability to perform multiple duties as assigned 
  

  
+  Basic knowledge of equipment safety procedures 
  

  
+  Operate a wide variety of equipment from lawn & garden tractors to large combines 
  

  
+  Forklift certification. 
  

  

  
  PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS:  
  

  

  
+  Ability to run a high-pressure washer for extended time periods 
  

  
+  Ability to lift items weighing up to 75 lbs. 
  

  
+  Extended periods of walking, standing and bending and climbing may be required. 
  

  
+  Ability to work in outdoor conditions in wide ranges of ambient temperatures. 
  

  

  
 ***THIS COMPANY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO MODIFY, INTERPRET, OR APPLY THIS JOB DESCRIPTION IN ANY WAY THE COMPANY DESIRES. THIS JOB DESCRIPTION IN NO WAY IMPLIES THAT THESE ARE THE ONLY DUTIES, INCLUDING ESSENTIAL DUTIES, TO BE PERFORMED BY THE EMPLOYEE OCCUPYING THIS POSITION. THIS JOB DESCRIPTION IS NOT AN EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT IMPLIED OR OTHERWISE. THE EMPLOYMENT RELATIONSHIP REMAINS “AT WILL.” THE AFOREMENTIONED JOB REQUIREMENTS ARE SUBJECT TO REASONABLY ACCOMMODATE QUALIFIED DISABLED INDIVIDUALS.***
